heading: HB09154
0: AN ACT PROHIBITING THE SPREAD OF ONLINE VIRAL CHALLENGE THAT IS DETRIMENTAL TO THE MORAL, MENTAL AND PHYSICAL DEVELOPMENT OF CHILDREN
status: Pending with the Committee on WELFARE OF CHILDREN since 2019-05-20
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09154
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING THE SPREAD OF ONLINE VIRAL CHALLENGE THAT IS DETRIMENTAL TO THE MORAL, MENTAL AND PHYSICAL DEVELOPMENT OF CHILDREN
ABSTRACT : Aims to address viral online issues circulating like Momo challenge or Blue Whale challenge which persuades children to undertake tasks that could lead to serious physical injuries or even deaths. Intends to enforce the banning and prohibiting all forms of suicidal online viral challenge which are detrimental to children.
ALIAS NAME : "Anti-Deadly Online Viral Challenge"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2019-03-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN ON 2019-05-20
